mapper.select: select faqno, mcate2no, queryno, title, content, path, appdt from gms_faq order by faqno desc
select faqno, mcate2no, queryno, title, content, path, appdt from gms_faq where faqno=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into gms_faq(mcate2no, queryno, title, content, path, appdt) values(#{mcate2no}, #{queryno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{path}, #{appdt})
mapper.update: update gms_faq set mcate2no = #{mcate2no}, queryno = #{queryno}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, path = #{path}, appdt = #{appdt} where faqno = #{no}
